text: 3.4 Sng 45.13, Lom 7.22, 2 Ko 4.16 Nɨbi pen nab nɨbi ayaŋ tɨb kadɨŋ ñɨnɨmɨb. Tap anɨb okok tɨmel ma gɨnɨmuŋ tek lup. Pen tap tɨb kadɨŋ ñɨnɨgabɨm anɨb okok anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Nɨbi sayn tep kɨmɨgel mɨdɨl, kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb. Anɨgem, God ne nɨgek nop tep gek, nɨbi tap teplep gɨl bin teplep yɨbɨl mɨdebɨm agɨl gos nɨgup.
